content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. While discussing the rental price for my Munich apartment, let me start with a higher figure than what I may ultimately accept, ensuring maximum benefit for myself. My initial proposition for the monthly rent would be 1250 Euros. However, be assured that I'm open to negotiating further based on your considerations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your initial proposal, Mister Schmidt. While I understand your interest in receiving the highest rent possible, as a responsible tenant I must attempt to secure the most affordable price for this apartment. With that in mind, I would like to propose starting negotiations with a rental price of 1100 Euros per month. If we can reach an agreement at this amount, I'll be delighted to take the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your interest in my Munich apartment but find your proposed rental price, at 1100 Euros per month, insufficient to meet my expectations. I don't want to continue the negotiation solely due to this significant difference in our starting positions. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
